Visible.description: Only valid for static section, will be ignored in dynamic sections and List pickers.

Title.description: Title text to be displayed on the cell

Subhead.description: A sub-header label in the main view.

Footnote.description: Text of footnote, which is initially hidden. Setting a non-empty string would no longer hide the label. This is supported only for iOS & Android.

DetailImage.description: Image to be displayed in the cell.

DetailImageIsCircular.description: If the value is true, the image is displayed in a circular shape.

StatusText.description: A status label displayed in the status view. Itâ€™s expected to either set `StatusText` or `StatusImage` to display either one as the same position. When both are set, `StatusImage` would be displayed in priority. Would not be displayed if control is rendered within FlexibleColumnLayout (except for last column), use `StatusImage` instead.

Description.description: Will not be displayed if control is rendered within FlexibleColumnLayout (except for last column).

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the object cell is pressed.

OverflowButtons.description: Defines the ActionItems for the Object Card. On Mobile Platforms (iOS & Android), this is fully supported. On the web platform, only the first visible instance of the ActionItems would appear.

PrimaryAction.description: Defines the primary action button for the Object Card.

SecondaryAction.description: Defines the secondary action button for the Object Card.

Styles.description: Style to be applied on the object card. Note that font size & bold style & font background color are not supported for Android. Only red, green and default color are supported for Android `StatusText` style. CSS Shadow Parts are required for the `BackgroundColor`, `Title`, `SubHead` & `StatusText` styles of Web Client.

Description.description: The string value is a style class name of `Description`.

Footnote.description: The string value is a style class name of `Footnote`.

StatusText.description: The string value is a style class name of `StatusText`.

Subhead.description: The string value is a style class name of `Subhead`.

Title.description: The string value is a style class name of `Title`.

BackgroundColor.description: The string value is a style class name of `BackgroundColor`.

DetailImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `DetailImage`.
